trans-unit.source: Manage news and export them as RSS or Atom feed
trans-unit.target: Administrar las novitads ed las exportar sco RSS u atom feed.

trans-unit.source: Adds a list of news items to the page
trans-unit.target: Agiunscha a la pagina ina glista da novitads.

trans-unit.source: Shows the details of a news item
trans-unit.target: Mussa ils detagls d'in element da novitads.

trans-unit.source: Adds a news archive to the page
trans-unit.target: Agiunscha a la pagina in archiv da novitads.

trans-unit.source: Generates a navigation menu to browse the news archive
trans-unit.target: Generescha in menu da navigaziun per navigar en l'archiv da novitads.
